Stixbox Function

NOM

    rjpoiss - Random numbers from the poisson distributio

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

x=rjpoiss(n,l)

PARAMETRES

    • n : positive integer or vector [lig,col] of integers
    • l : positive real
    • x : n-vector of random numbers chosen from a poisson distribution with parameter

DESCRIPTION

    Random numbers from the poisson distribution (reject method)

    Adapted from Press, Teukolsky, Vetterling and Flannery, Numerical Recipes in C p.222
